<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Determines which set of metadata to collect for this instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Returns true if covered metadata is required to unambiguously interpret</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// other metadata. For example, if we are interested in atomics metadata, any</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function with memory operations (atomic or not) requires covered metadata</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Tail-called functions are not necessary intercepted</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
